"Grind Your Favorite Items!":
"ARKS these days are so reckless!
It's no exaggeration to say you're
entrusting your life to your equipment,
and yet so many don't upgrade it.
I hear the same old excuses...
\"Getting Grinders is a hassle, the chance
of failing is too high.\"
They need to follow their elders' advice!
For my part, my favorite weapon is...
※Skill Rings are excluded."
